item.title: An options strategy that could tap Netflix's value no matter what happens with Warner Bros. deal
item.description: Merger uncertainty is pressuring Netflix stock, which is down almost 29% from its June highs, while options premiums have risen considerably.

item.title: This casino stock is beating the market in 2025. Why Goldman thinks the new year will bring more gains
item.description: The bank upgraded the casino operator to buy from neutral.

item.title: Jefferies sees more outperformance ahead for this cruise stock after year-to-date rally
item.description: The bank upgraded the cruise stock to buy from hold.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts are upbeat on these 3 dividend stocks for enhanced returns
item.description: TipRanks' ranking service discusses three dividend-paying stocks, including Devon Energy and CVS Health.

item.description: China's focus on food security mirrors efforts for self-sufficiency in chips and energy, Goldman Sachs said.
